mapper.select: select f.*,t.typeName,m.moduleName from i_food f,i_foodtype t,i_module m where f.typeid = t.id and f.moduleid = m.id and concat(f.foodName,f.description,t.typeName,m.moduleName) like '%${input}%'
select f.*,t.typeName,m.moduleName from i_food f,i_foodtype t,i_module m where f.typeid = t.id and f.moduleid = m.id and f.foodName = #{foodName}
select f.*,t.typeName,m.moduleName from i_food f,i_foodtype t,i_module m where f.typeid = t.id and f.moduleid = m.id and f.id = #{id}
select f.*,t.typeName,m.moduleName from i_food f,i_foodtype t,i_module m where f.typeid = t.id and f.moduleid = m.id and f.img = #{img}

select f.*,t.typeName,m.moduleName from i_food f,i_foodtype t,i_module m where f.typeid = t.id and f.moduleid = m.id and f.state = 1 and f.moduleid = 1 and f.foodName like '%${input}%'
and f.typeid = #{typeid}

select f.*,t.typeName,m.moduleName from i_food f,i_foodtype t,i_module m where f.typeid = t.id and f.moduleid = m.id and f.state = 1 and f.moduleid = 3 and f.foodName like '%${input}%'
and f.typeid = #{typeid}

select f.*,t.typeName,m.moduleName from i_food f,i_foodtype t,i_module m where f.typeid = t.id and f.moduleid = m.id and f.state = 1 and f.moduleid = 2 and f.foodName like '%${input}%'
and f.typeid = #{typeid}

select f.*,t.typeName,m.moduleName from i_food f,i_foodtype t,i_module m where f.typeid = t.id and f.moduleid = m.id and f.state = 1 and f.moduleid = 4 and f.foodName like '%${input}%'
and f.typeid = #{typeid}

select f.*,t.typeName from i_food f,i_foodtype t where f.typeid = t.id and f.state = 1 and f.isDiscount = 1 and f.foodName like '%${input}%'
and f.typeid = #{typeid}
